plot outline: A lawyer without practice is humorously called as Chettu Kinda Pleader. Balaraju (Rajendra Prasad) plays the title role in this film directed by Vamsy. Gopal krishna (Saratbabu), a rich businessman gets killed by goons and his widow requests Balaraju to take-up the case as no other lawyer is ready to help her. Sayrabaiah (Gollapudi Maruti Rao) claims that Sujatha (Urvashi) is not even married to Gopal Krishna. How Balaraju succeeds to unfold the mystery behind the death and what obstacles he faces are the contents of this comedy crime thriller.
title: Chettu Kinda Pleader
plot: A lawyer without practice is humorously called as _Chettu Kinda Pleader_ (qv). Balaraju (Rajendra Prasad) plays the title role in this film directed by Vamsy. Gopal krishna (Saratbabu), a rich businessman gets killed by goons and his widow requests Balaraju to take-up the case as no other lawyer is ready to help her. Sayrabaiah (Gollapudi Maruti Rao) claims that Sujatha (Urvashi) is not even married to Gopal Krishna. How Balaraju succeeds to unfold the mystery behind the death and what obstacles he faces are the contents of this comedy crime thriller.
